import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; const ProductModal = ({show, handleClose, productDATA}) => { const { name, imageSource, price, defaultCurrency, storeStock, type } = productDATA return ( <> {type.toUpperCase()}

{name}

{`${defaultCurrency} ${price.no_bundle}`}

 ) } export default ProductModal
